typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Client as string,
		BrandID as string,
		{Code Postal} as string,
		Nom as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> clientEHS
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sap
sap select(mapColumn(
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		{Org# commerciale} = {Org. commerciale}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, renamecols union(byName: true)~> Union1
clientEHS select(mapColumn(
		Client,
		{Org# commerciale} = BrandID,
		{Code postal} = {Code Postal},
		Nom
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renamecols
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['unionClientSapEHS'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sapUnionEHS
